attributes.action: allow the people of this country a referendum on the EU Treaty or we will not vote Labour in the next General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to let the Prime Minister Gordon Brown know that the people who sign this petiton will not vote for the Labour party in the next General Election due to him lying to the country about allowing us to vote on the EU Treaty/Constitution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
